subject: Gymnastics
Beer
lead_paragraph: Nastia Liukin was unable to defend her world title in the uneven bars yesterday in Stuttgart, Germany, but her silver medal put her one medal away from joining Shannon Miller as the most decorated American gymnast in world championship history.Liukin now has eight world medals; she can tie Miller’s record today in the balance beam finals.The gold medalists in the five individual events yesterday were Ksenia Semenova of Russia (uneven bars); Diego Hypolito of Brazil (men’s floor exercise); and China’s Chen Yibing (still rings), Xiao Qin (pommel horse) and Cheng Fei (women’s vault).
